text: Hipolito Gonzalez Calvo (born November 10, 1976 in Barcelona) is a goalball athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind. He is a B2 type goalball player. He played goalball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. He played goalball at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. == References == Category:Spanish goalball players Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
